summary: Alex's dreary life is reignited when he meets Rachel, the woman of his dreams. The only thing that stands in the way of their perfect, serendipitous relationship is that Rachel has recently passed away.
cast: Corey Sevier|Jordan Ladd|Ryan Alosio|Renee Dorian|Kim Poirier|Jeanette O'Connor|James Gleason|Chris Degner|Stacey Ann Shevlin|Marion Burton|Marie Wilson|Marc Van Enk|Sarinya Vorasarun|Scott Butzbach|Mark Francis|Bruce Robertson|Dorian Roberts|Nicole Chiu|Andy Francess|Meagann Pallares|Jesse Saler|Don Phillip Smith
keywords: coffee shop|male female relationship|brother brother relationship|woman hit by a car|surveillance tape
title: Awaken
